alert.note: Alert for Bradford (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN BRADFORD AND SOUTHWESTERN CLAY COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Keystone Heights, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Starke, Keystone Heights, Kingsley, Lake Geneva, Camp Blanding, and Lawtey. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
